patthana24.5:1.1_0: Nahetuṁ nosaññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana24.5:3.1_0: Nahetuṁ noganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana24.5:5.1_0: Nahetuṁ nooghaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu ogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana24.5:7.1_0: Nahetuṁ noyogaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu yogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana24.5:9.1_0: Nahetuṁ nonīvaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana24.5:11.1_0: Nahetuṁ noparāmāsaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu parāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
